statements: SELECT * FROM UserActivityLog;
SELECT user_id, action_performed FROM UserActivityLog WHERE accessed_system = 'systemA';
SELECT id FROM UserActivityLog WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserActivityLog WHERE user_id = '123-456-789';
SELECT accessed_system, COUNT(*) AS count FROM UserActivityLog GROUP BY accessed_system;
SELECT * FROM UserActivityLog WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserActivityLog WHERE accessed_system = 'Server 1' AND action_performed = 'Login';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM UserActivityLog GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT accessed_system, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users FROM UserActivityLog GROUP BY accessed_system;
SELECT DISTINCT accessed_system, action_performed FROM UserActivityLog WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM user_access_logs;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_access_logs WHERE remote_system = 'Internal';
SELECT user_id, action, remote_system FROM user_access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM security_monitoring WHERE event_type = 'Unauthorized Access' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, event_type, details FROM security_monitoring WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_access_logs WHERE user_id = 12345 AND action = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logins FROM user_access_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_logins DESC;
SELECT user_id, event_type, details->>'severity' AS severity FROM security_monitoring WHERE event_type = 'Suspicious Activity' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM security_monitoring WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_event_time FROM security_monitoring WHERE event_type = 'Unauthorized Access' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY last_event_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_access_logs;
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM user_access_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT accessed_system, access_time FROM user_access_logs WHERE access_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT system_name, log_message FROM system_logs WHERE system_name = 'System-A' ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time, accessed_system FROM user_access_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs WHERE activity_time > '2022-01-01' AND activity_time < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY user_id ASC, activity_time DESC;
SELECT system_name, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM system_logs GROUP BY system_name HAVING log_count > 100 ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(activity_time) AS latest_activity_time FROM user_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY latest_activity_time DESC;
SELECT accessed_system, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM access_time)) AS avg_access_time FROM user_access_logs GROUP BY accessed_system HAVING avg_access_time > 60 ORDER BY avg_access_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity FROM user_access_log WHERE login_success = true ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, password FROM user_credentials WHERE last_reset > '2021-01-01';
SELECT system_id, system_name, location FROM remote_systems WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM user_credentials JOIN user_roles ON user_credentials.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM user_access_log ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_access_log WHERE user_id = 1 AND login_success = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity FROM user_access_log WHERE activity LIKE '%Login%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT ual.user_id, us.system_name, ual.timestamp FROM user_access_log ual JOIN remote_systems us ON ual.remote_system_id = us.system_id WHERE ual.login_success = FALSE ORDER BY ual.timestamp DESC;
SELECT ual.user_id, uc.username, uc.last_reset FROM user_access_log ual JOIN user_credentials uc ON ual.user_id = uc.user_id ORDER BY uc.last_reset ASC;
SELECT ua.user_id, ur.role_name FROM user_access_log ua JOIN user_roles ur ON ua.user_id = ur.role_id WHERE ua.login_success = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_access FROM user_access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_access > 5;
SELECT id, activity_time, activity_description FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_time ASC;
SELECT id, system_name, ip_address FROM remote_systems WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT username, email, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM user_access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING access_count > 5;
SELECT u.username, r.system_name FROM users u JOIN remote_systems r ON u.id = r.id;
SELECT u.username, a.access_name FROM users u JOIN access_types a ON u.user_id = a.id;
SELECT u.first_name AS name, u.last_name AS surname, r.location AS location FROM users u JOIN remote_systems r ON u.id = r.id;
